titles.title: Providing for a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/15/2008--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Provides for appointment of a House of Representatives committee joined with a Senate committee to notify the President that a quorum of each House has assembled.
